content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used a new AI command to browse the website 'https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno' and asked "What are the best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area?" The website returned a list of hiking trails with ratings and reviews. I then used the 'google' command to search for the same query and received a list of results that included the AllTrails website as well as other relevant links. However, when I used the 'browse_website' command again, there was an error with no text to summarize.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "web_search", "args": {"query": "best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command web_search returned: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "question": "What are the best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Error: No text to summarize\n\nLinks: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "http://experienceeurope.eu/hiking-in-brno-my-top-5/", "https://littleholidays.net/blog/brno-czech-republic-where-to-stay/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g274714-d6701144-Reviews-Brno_Dam-Brno_South_Moravian_Region_Moravia.html", "https://www.trip.com/travel-guide/attraction/brno/brno-dam-58316975/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/AttractionsNear-g274714-d4381314-Brno_Kralovo_Pole_Station-Brno_South_Moravian_Region_Moravia.html"]', type='action_result')]
"""
